general_advisory:
Make arrangement for supplemental irrigation in standing crops like Groundnut, Sunflower, Chick pea, Maize, Green gram etc., wherever it is required. Farmers are advised to install 
“T” shaped bird perches in and around crop field like Chickpea, Green gram, Groundnut and vegetables for controlling insect population. Install pheromone trap @ 8/acre for monitoring borer insect in vegetables like brinjal, 
cauliflower, cabbage, tomato etc. Install yellow sticky trap @ 8 /acre to monitor sucking pest like White fly, Aphids, Jassids & blue sticky trap for Thirps in vegetables at vegetative stage. Always apply recommended dose of fertilizers according to the soil test report and recommended dose of pesticide in
correct method during morning or evening hours and pay attention to the wind direction during application. To control wilting in chick pea, s pray Carbendazim 50% WP @ 400g/ac mixed with 200 liters of water.

advisory: Tikka:  If symptom is noticed, application of Chlorothalonil 75% WP @ 400g/ac or Hexaconazole 5% EC @ 300 ml/ac or Mancozeb 75% WP @ 600 g/ac mixed with 200 liters of water is recommended.

Sucking pest complex (Aphid, Hopper, Thrips & White fly):  Prevailing weather condition favours the development of sucking pests. Need based spray of Acetamiprid 20% SP @ 50g/acre or Imidacloprid 17.8% SL @ 60 ml/acre mixed with 200 ltrs of water is recommended.
Powdery mildew:  Spray 0.2% wettable sulphur @ 2g /ltr of water.
Capitulum Borer:  Spray Bacillus thuringiensis var kurstaki 5% WP @ 1.5 g/ltr of water.
Head Rot:  Spray 0.4% Copper oxychloride 50% WP @ 3g/ltr of water.

Powdery mildew : Prevailing weather condition favours the development of powdery mildew disease. To control spray, Sulphur  80% WP  @ 800 g/ac or Propiconazole 25% EC @ 200ml/ac mixed with 200 liters of water.

Stem rot/Root rot/Wilting: Prevailing weather condition favours the development of fungal disease like collar rot, root rot, stem rot and wilting. If symptom is noticed spray Carbendazim 50% WP @ 400g/ac or Validamycin 3% L @ 400 ml/ac mixed with 200 liters of water.
Leaf eating caterpillar: The insects usally feed on the tender young leaves. Spray Profenophos 50 EC 400ml per acre mixed with 200 liters of water for its control.

Aphid and Whitefly:  Prevailing weather condition is favorable for incidence of sucking pest like aphid and white fly. Install yellow sticky traps @ 8nos/acre at vegetative stage to monitor pest population and  apply neem oil -based pesticide Azadiractin 0.03% ( 300 ppm) @ 5ml/ltr of water at initial stage of infestation.  For chemical control, spray Imidacloprid 17.8% SL @ 4ml or Thiamethoxam 25% WG @ 3g or Chlorpyriphos 20% EC @ 35 ml b...
Nutrient Management:   After hoeing and weeding, a pply 45kg Urea as first top dressing at 4-week  stage followed by irrigation.
After hoeing and weeding, a pply 23kg Urea as second top dressing at 6 to 7-week stage followed by irrigation.

Fruit & Shoot borer:  Install pheromone trap @ 8nos/acre  to monitor pest population.  For chemical control, spray or Flubendiamide 39.35% SC @ 3 ml Cyntranliprole 10.26% OD @ 3 0ml or Thiamethoxam 12.6% + Lambda -cyhalothrin 9.5% ZC @ 4ml  or Indoxacarb14.5% SC @ 15 ml mixed  with 15 liters  of water .

Leaf curling/White fly : Leaf curling may notice due to white fly infestation. Install yellow sticky  trap @ 8nos/acre  to monitor pest population.  For chemical control, spray Dimethoate 30% EC @ 20 ml or Cyntr...

Mite : Stunted growth with d ownward curling and crinkling of leaves are seen i n mite infested chili plants.  Apply  Ethion 50 % EC or Propargite 57 % EC @ 600-ml/acre mixed with 200 liters of water to control mite infestation .
Black spot:  To control black spot disease in Rose spray Copper Oxy -chloride 50% WP @ 3g/ltr of water.
Inflorescence  rot: To control inflorescence rotting in Merigold spray Mancozeb 75% WP @ 2g or Carbendazim 50% WP @ 1g by mixing with one liter of water.
